title: Effortless Cool-Girl Vibes Are the Goal—26 Sale Picks From J.Crew and Gap That Fit the Bill
text: This spring sale season has been full of amazing deals. To be quite honest, it's been tricky having to narrow down my top picks from all of the chic options available right now. Two retailers that are killing it this week are J.Crew and Gap, with both offering up to 40% off of select styles.I made a roundup below with a variety of spring pieces from each sale that have "cool girl" written all over them. This includes a curated selection of effortless dresses, tops, jeans, shoes, and more. Keep scrolling to shop 26 incredibly chic sale picks from J.Crew and Gap. Good luck picking just one piece.J.Crew Sale details: Get 40% off of select pieces from April 8 to April 14. J.Crew Wide-Leg Essential Pant in Linen J.Crew Large Handknotted Packable Tote Bag Perfect for spring and summer. J.Crew New Relaxed Linen T-Shirt Loving the barely-sheer look. J.Crew Hyacinth V-Neck Dress in Ramie J.Crew Hyacinth Top in Cotton Poplin A step up from your usual white tee. J.Crew Garçon Classic Shirt in Cotton Poplin I'll always love a classic blue button-down. J.Crew New Colbie Wide-Strap Sandals in Suede J.Crew Gwen Lace-Trim Slip Skirt in Textured Satin This whole look is a winner. J.Crew Cropped Fine Rib Scoopneck Tank Top J.Crew Strapless Colorblock Mixy Dress Contrast dresses are trending. J.Crew Rec Sneakers in Leather A fashion person favorite. J.Crew New Capitaine Shirt in Baird Mcnutt Irish Linen Another look to re-create this season. J.Crew Cabana Dress in Linen Perfect with or without a belt. GapGap Sale details: Get up to 40% off select items now until April 16. Gap High Rise Cuffed Barrel Jeans I'm obsessed with these jeans. Gap 100% Cotton Relaxed Sweater Striped sweaters are a personal favorite. Gap Linen-Blend Square-Neck Maxi Dress Fun flats to wear with everything. The wash of this denim jacket caught my eye. Gap Modern Rib Maxi T-Shirt Dress Bring on the bold red pieces. Boat shoes are having a moment. The perfect time to stock up on this basic. Gap Low Rise Barrel Parachute Pants The relaxed fit is spot-on. Flip-flop heels are on my mind. Gap Poplin Smocked Midi Dress Bring on the warm weather. Gap Organic Cotton Denim Classic Shirt Denim shirts are always a good idea. Gap 100% Cotton Crochet Ankle Pants This set is guaranteed to sell out.
html:
This spring sale season has been full of amazing deals. To be quite honest, it's been tricky having to narrow down my top picks from all of the chic options available right now. Two retailers that are killing it this week are J.Crew and Gap, with both offering up to 40% off of select styles.

I made a roundup below with a variety of spring pieces from each sale that have "cool girl" written all over them. This includes a curated selection of effortless dresses, tops, jeans, shoes, and more. Keep scrolling to shop 26 incredibly chic sale picks from J.Crew and Gap. Good luck picking just one piece.

J.Crew Sale details: Get 40% off of select pieces from April 8 to April 14.

J.Crew

Wide-Leg Essential Pant in Linen

J.Crew

Perfect for spring and summer.

Loving the barely-sheer look.

A step up from your usual white tee.

I'll always love a classic blue button-down.
